text: honda welawata uuta ahuwune mage kalisam kakula witharayi.
yuropiyan wadi denek handi garoppu pawichchi karanawa.
susanwara himiyo pawasathi.gowithanata amatharawa kithul karmanthaya da karana gamiyo eya maha parimanayen nam nokarathi.“gedarata kanna thamayi hakuru tikak pani tikak hadaganne.
thawath hethu da me kerehi balapanawa.
me gobba rasikayange manasikathwaye amaradewa mahaththaya unne na.
wellak ha bandi mema lipiya thawamath ankura lipiyaki.
eheth mewani pudgalayange wiwaha diwiya sarthaka lesa galagena yana ek sadhakayak atha.
ekama eka prashnayak./bala upparawatti anugamanaya no karamin/oba pawichchi nokarana (samaharawita anekun pawichchi karana) ewan upparawatti kawareda dana ganu kamaththemi.-
sirima rumathiya jiwathun athara sitiyadi, dhanawath situwarun, kulawathun ema rupaye rasawinda.
guwan thotupola dekak thiyenawa.
ithin umbae adwayis ahala me wenakota ki denak marunada ?

me minissu obayi, mamayi wage batahira yuropiya arthayen libaral minissu neweyi.

ihatha sadahan kala paridi dhanayata diyunuwata hodama kalaya udawanne nowambar 15 dinen shani 11 yamath samagaya.ge dora idakadam,idikirim, yanawahana labim,hadisi dhana labha mathuwana bawa sadahanya.senasuru maha dashawa athi ha upathe shani 11 pihiti ayata mema subhapala itha hodin ismathuwe.
warthamanaya wana wita apata boho wita asannata dakinnata labena deyak thamayi mathru saha pithru ghathana.
aru ayiya monawa kiyannada kiyala hithaganna ba.
ithin oya sathkaraye prathipala aawe adayi...
me nisa bohomayak patakayan dan rawana gana liyawena katha kiyawimath prathikshepa kara atha.
hela urumaya wewa eksath jathika pakshaya wewa, shrilanka nidahas pakshaya wewa, ada karanne rate mahajanthawage chandayen pathwi gasakamin balaya anisi lesa pawichchi kirimayi.
mage chithrapata adatath ti. wi. eke wikashaya wenawa.
balamu api katath bari wena ekak na.
me ethuman 1997 di pariwarthanaya kara prakashayata pathwunu "tarsange puthraya" nam pothehi perawadanen kotasak , obama kiyawa balanna, ada me de kopamana sathya wi thibeda yanna.
me dinawala amarikanu sancharayata hedi sitina gotabhaya rajapaksha hitapu aarakshaka lekam ha amathi susil premjayanth mahatha athara hamuwak eratadi siduwa athi bawa wartha weyi.
nona kiwwada danne na..

anek paththata me dhanapathi nithiya yatathe wruththiya samithi hadanna nithyanukulawa idadenne wadakarana janathawage swalpayakata pamanayi.
aya rohalata gena giyeth mamayi.
ee wena kisi deyak hinda nemeyi anagathayak nathi bawa danena hinda.
anika, kliyopatra wage balallunta nisi salakili dena rajya nayakayo behethakatawath hoyaganna nathi kaleka payak dekak inna ekath wasa kammali wadak.”

ee yantha්raya magin dwimaya paniwidaya widyuth spandaka bawata harawanu labu athara eewa owunge molaye penima palanaya karana aparakapala khandikawata yawanu labuwa.ee widyuth spandaka yawu mohothe owunta danuna, fosfina aalokayak kshanikawa athi wi nathi wi yana bawa.

madhyathana yugaya awasana wana wita aaraksha wi thibu aakimidisge lipi kihipayaka pitapath widyathmaka punaruda samaye widyagnyayanta balapam athi kala sema owunta adahas sandaha mulayak lesa da kriya kaleya. 1906 warshaye di ee wana thek lowata heli wi nothibu aakimidis pathrika (mehidi aakimidisge liyawili maka nawatha yoda gena atha.)
api me awasan wakyayen lankawe athi ingrisi leda handuna gannata uthsaha karamu.

onna ithin ee kaleth hitiya niyama mithuru kalak.me kattiyath ithin amathaka karannama ba.onna ithin me aya hitiye samanyapela patan gaththa kale.ee kiyanne dahaya wasaredi.ee kale ape panthiya thibune guruwarunge kamarayata thawath panthikamarayak eha paththen ithin kattiyata wadiya kagahanna ehema ba eha paththata ahena nisa.ithin eeka nisa kagahanne nathuwa karanna puluwan okkoma dewal kala.onna ithin me kale allapu panthiye kiyala na kattiya okkoma ekathuwenawa.
